name: Supplier Wise Warehouse Item Sales Summary
query:
select
    	si_item.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
	si_item.description as "Description:Data:350",
	sum(si_item.base_net_amount) as "Net Sales:Currency:120",
	(select (sum(stock_value)/sum(qty_after_transaction) * sum(si_item.stock_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` where item_code = si_item.item_code and (warehouse = 'Store - Shuwaikh - SB' or warehouse = 'Ahmadi S/R - SB' or warehouse = 'Decor - Shuwaikh - SB' or warehouse = 'Main SB - SB' or warehouse = 'Shuwaikh S/R - SB') and is_cancelled='No') as 'COGS:Currency:120',
	(sum(si_item.base_net_amount) - (select (sum(stock_value)/sum(qty_after_transaction) * sum(si_item.stock_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` where item_code = si_item.item_code and (warehouse = 'Store - Shuwaikh - SB' or warehouse = 'Ahmadi S/R - SB' or warehouse = 'Decor - Shuwaikh - SB' or warehouse = 'Main SB - SB' or warehouse = 'Shuwaikh S/R - SB') and is_cancelled='No')) as 'Profit:Currency:120',
	(((sum(si_item.base_net_amount) - (select (sum(stock_value)/sum(qty_after_transaction) * sum(si_item.stock_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` where item_code = si_item.item_code and (warehouse = 'Store - Shuwaikh - SB' or warehouse = 'Ahmadi S/R - SB' or warehouse = 'Decor - Shuwaikh - SB' or warehouse = 'Main SB - SB' or warehouse = 'Shuwaikh S/R - SB') and is_cancelled='No')) / sum(si_item.base_net_amount)) * 100) as 'Profit Per:Percent:120',
	sum(si_item.stock_qty) as "Sold Qty:Float:100",
	(select sum(actual_qty) from `tabBin` where item_code = si_item.item_code and (warehouse = 'Ahmadi S/R - SB' or warehouse = 'Decor - Shuwaikh - SB' or warehouse = 'Main SB - SB' or warehouse = 'Shuwaikh S/R - SB' or warehouse = 'Store - Shuwaikh - SB'))  as 'Bal Qty:Int:100',
	sum(si_item.base_net_amount) / sum(si_item.stock_qty) as "AVG SP:Float:100",
	(select (sum(stock_value)/sum(qty_after_transaction) * sum(si_item.stock_qty)) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` where item_code = si_item.item_code and (warehouse = 'Store - Shuwaikh - SB' or warehouse = 'Ahmadi S/R - SB' or warehouse = 'Decor - Shuwaikh - SB' or warehouse = 'Main SB - SB' or warehouse = 'Shuwaikh S/R - SB') and is_cancelled='No') / sum(si_item.stock_qty) as 'AVG Cost:Float:100',
	(select cl_1 from `tabItem` where item_code = si_item.item_code) as 'CL 1:Data:100',
	(select cl_2 from `tabItem` where item_code = si_item.item_code) as 'CL 2:Data:100'
from
	`tabSales Invoice` si, `tabSales Invoice Item` si_item
where
	(si.name = si_item.parent) and (si.docstatus = 1)  group by si_item.item_code;
report_name: Supplier Wise Warehouse Item Sales Summary
